PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04592022-05-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add twenty-one (21) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; and (2) move Schedule 6 of the Regulations to Annex 1 of the Restricted Goods and Technologies List.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0095 Publication Date: 2022-05-25
AttachmentsAttachment
